attributes.additional_details: AFTER THE AFTERMATH OF THE PUBLIC SPENDING COMMITTEE V/S BBC TEAM, WE HAVE LOST THE CONFIDENCE IN BBC AND THEIR SPENDING OF THE TAXPAYERS MONEY IN THIS SHOCKING WAY. MOREOVER IN THIS CENTURY OF COMPETITION AND  BBC'S CULTURE OF 'SWEETENING THE CONTRACTS' WITH TAXPAYERS MONEY, WE, THE UNDERSIGNED WOULD NOT LIKE TO PAY TV LICENSE FEE ANYMORE OR AT LEAST WANT TO STOP BBC BEING FUNDED BY TAXPAYERS MONEY. WE BELIEVE, BBC, LIKE OTHER MEDIA CHANNELS, SHOULD ARRANGE THE FUNDS BY OTHER MEANS BUT NOT TAXPAYERS MONEY.
